caption: In the darkness of the night, two men were conversing by a fence. Both of them were dressed in black attire, making them almost indistinguishable. They seemed to be engrossed in their conversation, which lasted for a long time.Suddenly, one of the men stood up and left, but just as he did, he drew his sword and killed the other man he had been talking to.In another place, under a canopy, a man was engaged in painting, and another man approached him, drawing his sword. They appeared to be in a tense standoff.At a meeting, a woman was praying or pleading for something to a group of people.
